R

readLine() - Static method in class PRINTER
The method to wait for user input
removeControl(Control) - Method in class Controls
Method to remove a Control Object from the list of Control Objects

The method to remove an enemy from this fight

Response - Class in <Unnamed>
Response is the class to represent a possible response to a conversation statement
Response(String, int) - Constructor for class Response
The constructor for a Response
response - Variable in class Response
The test of the response
responses - Variable in class ConversationNode
The available responses that the player can say
run() - Method in class Control
The method to execute the functionality that was passed when the Control was created
run() - Method in interface Runner
The method to run the logic in this Runner
runEvent() - Method in class InteractionEvent
The method to store the logic of the InteractionEvent This will be filled in subclasses (anonymous classes in data_events)
Runner - Interface in <Unnamed>
Runner is the interface to store logic for any task
